product_name: Beekman 1802Milk Scrub Oat and Goat Milk Exfoliating Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBeekman 1802's Milk Scrub Oat and Goat Milk Exfoliating Facial Cleanser gently polishes skin and minimizes pores for smoother, more vibrant skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe first clinically proven facial cleanser that combines soothing oat milk, nourishing goat milk and jojoba beads for gentle exfoliation.Unlike skin-damaging scrubs, the round, pressure-sensitive jojoba beads prevent microtears or over-exfoliationClears away skin-dulling buildup and increases radiancePolishes away dead skin cells without punishing skinMinimizes poresSafe for sensitive skinDermatologist-approvedKey IngredientsOat Milk: packed with soothing saponins to reduce inflammation & calm itchy skinGoat Milk: rich in Omega 3, 6 fatty acids that hydrate and nourishJojoba Beads: round, pressure-sensitive beads for physical exfoliation and the prevention of microtears.Formulated without parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, alcohol, skin-damaging exfoliantsResearch Results100% saw smooth skin with 0 microtears96% said this product was both exfoliating and soothing96% said this exfoliator scrubs away skin-dulling build upItem 2630022How To UseApply a dime size amount to damp skin and gently massage into skin. Rinse.Use twice daily as the first step in your skincare routine in the morning and evening.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Wax, Glycerin,1, 2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Lactic Acid, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Ferment Extract, Yogurt, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Palmitic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tromethamine, Xanthan Gum, Caramel, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Phytate, Myristic Acid, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate , Iron Oxides (Cl 77492) ... and Kindness. Does not contain live cultures.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a dime size amount to damp skin and gently massage into skin. Rinse.Use twice daily as the first step in your skincare routine in the morning and evening.
ingredients: Iron Oxides (Cl 77492) ... and Kindness. Does not contain live cultures

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: This scrub is so amazing! It's like using lotion with your cleanser because most cleansers dry your skin and because this has goat's milk it's completely moisturizing, refreshing and if you have sensitive skin like me it's perfect!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This scrub from Beekmens is amazing I use it twice a week and I can see the difference in my skin

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: Love this product. Makes my face feel so clean. Love your products.  Try to have more sales once in awhile.  Thank u

reviews.headline: Gentle, yet effective cleanser
reviews.comments: This is a pretty good cleanser. I love switching up my exfoliating cleansers so I decided to try this one. It does the job of gently exfoliating my face, but leaves it feeling smooth after. After a few uses I have not had any irritation (I have sensitive skin) so that is a win! It is a bit pricey in my opinion, but it will last you quite a while so that kinda balances it out.

reviews.headline: I wanted to like it, but it made me break out every time
reviews.comments: I used it around 7 times in the bath. I liked how it felt and how it smelled. However, every time I would break out after using it. I tried many times to really make sure it was this product. Not many things make me break out, but this did. I threw it out.

reviews.headline: I like it
reviews.comments: Does good for sensitive skin, will buy again.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: This is a very gentle exfoliator

reviews.headline: I Like It!
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. This is one of the few face washes I have used that leaves my face feeling clean and hydrated. The jojoba beads are gentle on my skin, and I never had a reaction to it. The only thing I do not like about this face wash is the price. The price is why I only buy it when it goes on sale.

reviews.headline: If you like feeling granules on your skin for hours, buy it
reviews.comments: The exfoliation is fine but the granules will not wash away even with rinsing my face many times. I'm shocked by how many good reviews there are. I'll be donating this to my 12 year old niece

reviews.headline: Doesn't work
reviews.comments: It's gentle but its not doing much. The skin doesn't feel clean and exfoliated after use. For this price, its not worth it.

reviews.headline: Great scrub, helps my acne
reviews.comments:
I recently tried a different product from another company that ruined my very  sensitive combination skin. After searching for a few weeks trying to find a new product that would be more pleasant on my skin, the skincare specialist at Ulta showed this cleanser scrub to me.
I was skeptical at first but gave it a try. I have been using it for 4 days now. It doesn't irritate my skin at all, feels very soothing, feels gentle on my acne spots, makes my skin feel very smooth, does not dry me out, and is helping to clear my blemishes. It is great for daily use, I use it both in the morning and the evening with no issues.

reviews.headline: Safe for my face with ezcema
reviews.comments: Love!

reviews.headline: I don't like the granules
reviews.comments: I bought this because I really like the Beekman 1802 line and has always worked well with my skin. Also the reviews were good so I thought I just couldn't go wrong here. Sadly this just doesn't do it for me. The granules in it that are suppose to exfoliate the skin are way to big,few and far between, and just rolls around on your skin. I do not feel like I am getting any dead skin off or exfoliating at all. It's more like a massage. Also, the cleanser itself is so thick and heavy, I feel as if I really have to rub my face a little harder than normal to rinse it all off during the rinsing process. Also doesn't lather so I don't really know why it's called a cleanser. There's been no change for the better or the worse after using this, so I don't see myself repurchasing in the future. If it didn't cost so much I wouldn't even finish it, however I can't bring myself to throw away money. I recommend looking elsewhere for a good exfoliator.

reviews.headline: Amazing Scrub!
reviews.comments: This is hands down one of the best exfoliating scrubs I've ever gotten at Ulta. It's the right amount of exfoliation that I can use it on my sensitive face and it will remove buildup and makeup without damaging my skin.

reviews.headline: First Time Buyer, but so not the last time!!
reviews.comments: It's love! I have very sensitive skin and this gentle exfoliation leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized!! Thankful this entire line up is cruelty free!! Fantastic product!!!

reviews.headline: Gritty
reviews.comments: This would have been perfect if the jojoba spheres dissolved but they dont. I have to keep flushing my face with water several times to get my face clear of them.

reviews.headline: Best for mature skin
reviews.comments: Very very gentle face cleaner.  So gentle it didn't remove my make up hence minus 1 star....it is super gentle which is great for mature skin and/or persons with some dermo issues. I am going to keep it &  just use my reg face wash first....it does leave your skin smooth & soft.

reviews.headline: Love this gentle scrub
reviews.comments: Wonderful product! Love the entire Beekman line. This gently exfoliates without any drying issues.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I have extremely sensitive skin (acne + eczema) and this scub works perfectly! Its helped my acne as well. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love love love!
reviews.comments: Gentle but effective. Leaves my skin soft and smoothe.

I would totally buy this product again
I would totally buy this product again

faceoff_positive.comments: I have combination skin and it is hard to find products that help with blemish prone skin. I absolutely LOVE the new goat milk scrub. It makes my skin so soft and exfoliates so gently. I own so many Beekman products but this is by far my favorite. Definitely add this to your skincare routine!
faceoff_positive.headline: New favorite

faceoff_negative.comments:
I am not sure I would repurchase this product again, but it is not a bad product. It has a very, very, very light scent, which is great. It is free of fragrance, sulfates, mineral oil, alcohol, phthalates, synthetic, colorants, formaldehyde, talc and parabens. That being said, I still think the ingredient list is too long.

The product has a thin yet creamy texture. Scrubs are not typically good for winter on my skin so I really don't appreciate how it made my skin feel.

The only thing I really dislike is the little granules that acts as the exfoliating agent.
faceoff_negative.headline: The product is just fine.
